# The `ByteSizeStorage` Struct Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

The following field is used for ByteSize for non-implicit&#95;const attributes and as value for implicit&#95;const ones, indicated by Form == DW&#95;FORM&#95;implicit&#95;const. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

The following field is used for ByteSize for non-implicit&#95;const attributes and as value for implicit&#95;const ones, indicated by Form == DW&#95;FORM&#95;implicit&#95;const.

The following cases are distinguished:
<ul>
<li>Form != DW&#95;FORM&#95;implicit&#95;const and HasByteSize is true: ByteSize contains the fixed size in bytes for the Form in this object.</li>
<li>Form != DW&#95;FORM&#95;implicit&#95;const and HasByteSize is false: byte size of Form either varies according to the <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/dwarfunit">DWARFUnit</a> that it is contained in or the value size varies and must be decoded from the debug information in order to determine its size.</li>
<li>Form == DW&#95;FORM&#95;implicit&#95;const: <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/value">Value</a> contains value for the implicit&#95;const attribute.</li>
</ul>

Definition at line 67 of file <a href="/docs/api/files/include/include/llvm/include/llvm/debuginfo/include/llvm/debuginfo/dwarf/dwarfabbreviationdeclaration-h">DWARFAbbreviationDeclaration.h</a>.
